```
  ✖ Avoid using unnecessary Fragment.

    <>{foo}</>
    ^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ A Fragment is redundant if it contains only one child, or if it is the child of a html
    element, and is not a keyed fragment.

  ℹ Safe fix

    1   │ - <>
    2   │ - → {foo}
    3   │ - </>
      1 │ + {foo}


```
